fixed_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 82.4/86.5/90.6% of Attack. 9.3/9.8/10.2% chance to inflict Dizzy for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Sledgehammer

innate_skill.desc: At the start of battle, increase party's Attack by 4.2% for 2 turns or until user changes Personas.
innate_skill.name: Auto-Mataru I

innate_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to all foes equal to 30.0/31.5/33.0% of Attack (1 to 3 hits).
innate_skill.name: Rampage

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical damage by 7%. Increase critical rate on Dizzy foes by 21%.
passive_skill.name: Hopping Cyclops

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical damage by 7%. Increase critical rate on Dizzy foes by 24%.
passive_skill.name: Hopping Cyclops I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 360.0%/385.2%/410.4% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
